Luzbel:

The staff cut the blaster. Luzbel looked his blaster and said "HEY!!! 
IT WAS MY BEST BLASTER!!"

Luzbel was moving his tail and with out advice he strikes his tail 
against Aerotaur (The tail has quills).


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He saw the dragon land.  As the shots were fired he dove 
forward under 
> the shots.  He landed near Lambda's gun and tossed it up into the 
shots.  One 
> hit it and disintegrated it.  That was one less problem.  He picked 
himself 
> up and dashed at Luzbel.  "I have no intention of dying today."  He 
draws his 
> staff and slashes at the large gun.
